mapper.insert: insert into ge_policy (id, policy_detail_id, key_word, declaration_url, policy_type, area_id, comment_times, shared_times, upvote_times, favor_times, readed_times, created_time, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policyDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{declarationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sharedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upvoteTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{favorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ge_policy set policy_detail_id = #{policyDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, key_word = #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, declaration_url = #{declarationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_type = #{policyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_times = #{commentTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shared_times = #{sharedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upvote_times = #{upvoteTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, favor_times = #{favorTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readed_times = #{readedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, policy_detail_id, key_word, declaration_url, policy_type, area_id, comment_times, shared_times, upvote_times, favor_times, readed_times, created_time, updated_time from ge_policy where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
